content: Iâ€™m looking for some orientation documentation that describes the overall HL7 FHIR strategy and scope especially a visual depiction of the interconnections and relationship of the FHIR standards and IGs in place and under development. Are you aware of any materials (documents, diagrams, etc. from HL7 or other sources) that provide this kind of information?
no diagrams that I'm aware of. I haven't tried for something like this in any of my presentations. It's mostly all narrative
